title: Dynamic Personal Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, full-stack personal portfolio website with an AI-powered chatbot trained on professional background and experience to help recruiters and visitors learn about Nick's qualifications interactively.
description:
Full Description:

This is a comprehensive personal portfolio platform designed to showcase professional work and thought leadership. The product features a clean, Apple-inspired design with interactive navigation tiles, animated elements, and responsive layouts.

The core functionality includes a portfolio showcase with detailed project pages, a blog system with series organization, curated "Top 5" lists for sharing preferences and recommendations, and a contact system with email integration.

The standout feature is an AI-powered chatbot trained on the user's professional background, enabling visitors to ask questions about skills, experience, and qualifications through natural language interactions.

The admin dashboard provides complete content management capabilities, allowing real-time updates to projects, blog posts, resume uploads, and AI training data.

The platform implements advanced analytics with PostHog for user behavior tracking and includes sophisticated features like password-protected resume downloads and AI content polishing tools.
Key Features:

AI-Powered Chatbot with Smart Document Retrieval

  • LangChain integration with Chroma vector database for contextual responses

  • Real-time learning from user interactions with evaluation scoring

Advanced Analytics & User Behavior Tracking

  • PostHog integration for comprehensive user journey analysis

  • Event tracking across all user interactions (tile clicks, downloads, etc.)

Comprehensive Admin Dashboard with Content Management

  • Full CRUD operations for projects, blog posts, and portfolio content

  • Draft/publish workflows with content versioning

Dynamic Project Portfolio with Advanced Filtering

  • Category-based project organization with real-time filtering

  • Rich project details with technologies, challenges, and solutions

Professional Contact & Lead Management System

  • SendGrid email integration for automated notifications

  • Contact form submissions tracked in admin panel

Password-Protected Resume Download System

  • Secure file access with authentication

  • Download tracking and analytics

Real-Time Performance Monitoring

  • Comprehensive logging and error tracking

  • System health monitoring and evaluation metrics

New Skill Learned: Applied advanced prompt engineering and LangSmith evaluation frameworks for AI chatbot optimization and user experience analytics
